definitions.definition: A place where dead bodies are stored prior to burial or cremation ; broadly , synonym of funeral home .
A sort of ecclesiastical heriot , a customary gift claimed by, and due to, the minister of a parish on the death of a parishioner .

main_definition: A place where dead bodies are stored prior to burial or cremation ; broadly , synonym of funeral home .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A sort of ecclesiastical heriot , a customary gift claimed by, and due to, the minister of a parish on the death of a parishioner .
